1370: Waldfridus was born in Uterechse straet in 1370.
Got married to Nellen at age 20 in 1370.
1373: Had a son with Nellen, Wicghard, at age 23.
1374: Had a daughter with Nellen, Goneir, at age 24.
1378: Had a daughter with Nellen, Marisseis, at age 28.
1379: Had a daughter with Nellen, Pietersen, at age 29.
1380: Had a daughter with Nellen, Yda, at age 30.
1383: Lost son Wicghard when Wicghard was 11 years old.
1387: Had a son with Nellen, Jan, at age 37.
1388: Had a son with Nellen, Wolfraem, at age 38.
